note: These JSON files are synthetic example datasets for a dashboard project. Use them locally or wire them to a mock API (json-server, MSW) to prototype UI components and flows.
suggestions: Use users.json and teams.json to power user lists, profile menus, and team selectors.
projects.json + tasks.json -> project overview, kanban board, task lists, progress bars.
transactions.json + metrics.json -> finance dashboard, charts, revenue cards, top customers.
metrics.json is time-series that fits charting libs (recharts, chart.js, apexcharts).
Load notifications.json for a bell menu; activity_logs.json for audit trail.
roles_permissions.json can be used to gate UI actions on the client.
Serve files via a dev mock server (json-server) or create express endpoints to simulate backend.
